## Planned API

```tsx
interface [Component]Props {
  /**
   * [Description of prop]
   */

  /**
   * [Description of optional prop]
   * @default defaultValue
   */
  optionalProp?: OptionalType

  /**
   * [Description of children]
   */
  children?: React.ReactNode
}

export function [Component](props: [Component]Props): JSX.Element
```

## Proposed Usage

### Basic Example

```tsx
import { [Component] } from 'smithers-orchestrator'

export function MyWorkflow() {
  return (
    <[Component] propName="value">
      {/* Example usage showing typical pattern */}
    </[Component]>
  )
}
```

### Advanced Example

```tsx
// More complex usage demonstrating advanced features
export function AdvancedWorkflow() {
  return (
    <[Component]
      propName="value"
      optionalProp={customValue}
    >
      {/* Advanced pattern */}
    </[Component]>
  )
}
```
